data.text:
Shaquille O’Neal: “Big Guy Big Fame” Introduction Imagine you were in the NBA and it is the finals and it is the last round of the finals and you were down 15 points and 10 minutes left and all the odds are against you. That is what Shaquille O'Neal does he does the unthinkableand beats the odds. Shaquille O’neal is one of the many great basketball players. He has had so many achievements, a lot in basketball. He is a great player in this project I will talk about his birth, his early life, high school, college , in the NBA, and retirement. This project is going to take him through his life, so here it is. Birth Shaquille O’Neal was one of the greatest players. His full name is Shaquille Ranshaun O’ Neal which means “little warrior”, but he is not so little. He was born March 6, 1972 in Newark, New Jersey. Despite his …show more content…

The basketball players took him to a LSU football game and he loved it, he loved the atmosphere of it so he decided to play for them. He went to LSU for three years until he got drafted in the NBA. In the NBA He got drafted in the NBA in 1992 by the Orlando Magic. On his first game of the season it was a big celebration because everyone knew who he was and how good he was from when he was playing for LSU he was named player of the week in the first week he was in the NBA. He carried his team in his rookie year and got trade in 1996. He went and played for the Lakers in 1996 the main reason he left the Orlando Magic was because he got offered more money for play for the lakers.he averaged 28. 3 point a game and 11.4 rebounds in his first season. They won a championship in 2000-2001 and the 2002-2003 season . Then he got traded in
